title: Crashing for no reason.
body: Hello, all day today, I haven't been able to play because when i launch the game, it crashes for no reason, it was fine yesterday, ive tried repairing, going through the client air file and i cant even uninstall LoL because its not even in my Uninstall Program thing which it should be. I dont know what else to do.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I find it odd that league doesn't seem to appear in your list of installed programs, please try removing any files related to league of legends from your PC and running a registry cleaner such as [CCleaner](https://www.piriform.com/ccleaner/download) to remove any remnants left by the program then attempt to reinstall.

Let me know if this helps.
